entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Westport
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:35 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Rain, -3.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 06:27 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Rain
Temperature: -3.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -4.7°C
Wind: NNE 32 km/h gust 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early this afternoon then cloudy. Snow at times mixed with ice pellets and freezing rain early this morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Increasing cloudiness. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light late in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
